title: Is Agrify only for African farmers?
answer: we support farmers globally. Africa is where we began.

title: What languages does Agrify support?
answer: Pidgin, Yoruba, Hausa, Igbo, French, and more.

title: How do I get paid?
answer: Payments are made through smart escrow and released to your bank or wallet after delivery is confirmed.

title: Do I need internet all the time?
answer: it works offline and syncs once reconnected.
